name: 林含怡
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction 
Week 2: The Comparison and Contrast Essay
Week 3: The Comparison and Contrast Essay 
Week 4: The Classification Essay
Week 5: The Classification Essay 
Week 6: The Process Analysis Essay 
Week 7: The Process Analysis Essay 
Week 8: Writing Practice & Review
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: The Cause-and -Effect Essay 
Week 11: The Cause-and -Effect Essay 
Week 12: The Cause-and -Effect Essay
Week 13: The Argumentative Essay
Week 14: The Argumentative Essay 
Week 15: Project Writing: APA Style
Week 16: No Class
Week 17: Project Writing: Research Design
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance & class performance 25%
Assignments & activities 20%
Personal reflections 15%
Midterm exam and paper 20%
Final exam and paper 20%
materials: Smalley, R. L., Ruetten, M. K. & Kozyrev, J. R. (2012) Refining Composition Skills. Boston: National Geographic Learning.
